original_text:
The priests, the Levites, the gatekeepers, the musicians and the temple servants, along with certain of the people and the rest of the Israelites, settled in their own towns.
When the seventh month came and the Israelites had settled in their towns,
korean_text: 이와 같이 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 문지기들과 노래하는 자들과 백성 몇 명과 느디님 사람들과 온 이스라엘 자손이 다 자기들의 성읍에 거주하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The priests, the Levites, the gatekeepers, the musicians and the temple servants
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들, 레위인들, 문지기들, 음악가들과 성전의 종들이

sentences.original_text: along with certain of the people
and the rest of the Israelites
and the Israelites had settled in their towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 백성이 그들의 도시들에 정착했을 때
